For Agencies For Businesses Case Studies About

GROWTH TRACK

Technical consulting for growing businesses

I help growing businesses SOLVE technical problems, streamline workflows,
and make better decisions using the tools they already have — from WordPress and internal systems to Google Workspace and applied AI.

See proof Meet Belinda

Owner Support

How I help

I help business owners and internal teams make sense of complex technical challenges
— providing clear guidance, practical solutions, and hands-on support when needed.

Consulting

Technical clarity & problem-solving

I help diagnose technical issues, clarify options, and guide implementation — focusing on solutions that are practical, sustainable, and actually useful.

Optimization

Workflow &
operations tooling

I design lightweight apps and workflows using tools like Google Sheets and Docs, alongside existing systems, to improve visibility, decision-making, and day-to-day operations — without forcing teams onto expensive new platforms.

Efficency

Applied AI for real business workflows

I help businesses apply AI where it genuinely saves time or reduces complexity — including automating repetitive tasks, accelerating content or analysis workflows, and building internal tools faster through AI-assisted development.

This work is a good fit for businesses that want practical progress
— whether that’s incremental improvements, a full rebuild, or a longer-term platform migration.

Why this works

Built by someone
who’s run a business

I’m energized by how modern tools — especially AI — are making it possible for businesses to move faster, make better decisions, and do more with fewer resources.

I’ve also been an entrepreneur and business owner since 2005, which means I approach every recommendation with an eye toward profitability, sustainability, and real-world tradeoffs — not just what’s technically possible.

I’ve been building internal apps and workflows on top of tools like Google Sheets and Docs, using AI-assisted development to dramatically reduce build time and cost while improving visibility and decision-making.
